sessionCookie.title: Instagram Session Cookie (sessionid)

maxFollowsPerRun.title: Max Follows Per Run
maxFollowsPerRun.description: Maximum number of accounts to follow in this run (recommended: 10-40 depending on account age)

delayBetweenFollows.title: Delay Between Follows (seconds)
delayBetweenFollows.description: Time to wait between each follow action (recommended: 10-30 seconds)

useCleanedInput.title: Use Cleaned Input from Previous Run
useCleanedInput.description: If enabled, automatically uses the cleaned input from the previous run (removes already followed accounts). Make sure to run at least once first!
